reviews.name: Camp 4-Piece Daybed Set, Cherry Red With Stripes
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something to spice up the guest room and wanted to go with red for the daybed. I looked at several sites for daybed covers and found the least expensive at Walmart. I ordered and was so happy when it arrived and I put it on. Great quality for the price.
reviews.title: So much better than I expected for the price!

reviews.name: Camp 4-Piece Daybed Set, Cherry Red With Stripes
reviews.reviewText:
Lightening fast delivery and Love it
Material is great
Vibrant colors
reviews.title: Camp Daybed looks great

reviews.name: Camp 4-Piece Daybed Set, Cherry Red With Stripes
reviews.reviewText:
YOU DID SEND ME TWO "KING SHAMS" IN RED, NOT RED WITH STRIPES AS SHOWN IN YOUR PICTURE, AND SHOWED IN THE PACKAGE, THE REST IS THE CORRECT COLOR. THE KING SHAMS IS THE RIGHT COORDINATION, THAT IS WHY I ORDERED IT. I DID NOT WANT SO MUCH RED; I WAS EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTING.
HOWEVER, I LOVE THE QUALITY AND THE MATERIAL.

DAYBED: MY DAUGHTER LOVE IT. I DID RECEIVE IT IN GOOD COND. AND IT WAS EASY TO ASSEMBLED. IT IS BEAUTIFUL AND I WILL ORDER ANOTHER ONE IN THE FUTURE. THANKS!!!!
reviews.title: 15 April 2013

reviews.name: Camp 4-Piece Daybed Set, Cherry Red With Stripes
reviews.reviewText: the comforter arrived with what looks like food stains on it
reviews.title: bedding arrived dirty

reviews.name: Camp 4-Piece Daybed Set, Cherry Red With Stripes
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty day bed, but when my husband went to sit on it the bottom frame bent. The bed is made of very inexpensive metal and will not hold up to a person who is a little over 200 pounds. We only had it a week and had to take it back. I was very disappointed.
reviews.title: Pretty bed, but .....
